comments.raw_text:
I just spent some time debugging a build problem that was caused by an invalid NDK path in my .mozconfig. Using this option

ac_add_options --with-android-ndk="/some/nonexistant/dir"

causes the build to fail with 

"configure: error: Couldn't find path to stlport in the android ndk".

We should probably die earlier and point out that the specified NDK directory does not even exist. The message above is also related to other issues with libstdc++ and is misleading.
